welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ebino, a charming city nestled in the heart of southern Japan. Famous for its picturesque landscapes and traditional culture, we invite you to explore and experience all that Ebino has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kagoshima Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Kagoshima Airport serves flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Kagoshima Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting it and entering their email address.
